string-array.name: welcome_message_variants
string-array.item: 🎵 Rice to the Moon - Martins Bruno
🎵 Love the way u rice - Rihoney x Menime
🎵 Legends nevern\'t rice - Against the Curry

string-array.name: quickspace_psa_morning
string-array.item: Good morning beauty/handsome! - not an automated message
What about a small 5 minutes nap?
That\'s one way to wake up.
You should change your alarm sounds.
Looks like it\'s a beautiful day, isn\'t it?
Check the weather just in case
I\'m not alexa, swipe to the left for Google Feed!
The weather for today is.. oh wait i don\'t have weatherclient 😭

string-array.name: quickspace_psa_evening
string-array.item: Tomorrow might be a great day
Get your bones ready for tomorrow

string-array.name: quickspace_psa_midnight
string-array.item: Have you ever think about space at this time?
You should fix your sleep schedule
Are you more productive at this time?

string-array.name: quickspace_psa_random
string-array.item: Whats up? Got some games? - your cousin
Please tap the riceDroid version at settings for me.
What the heal? - definitely not Rafaela
The clock is just pixels above me...
I don\'t have Nowplaying API 😭 (cries in aosp)
It\'s because im an advanced thinker - A scammer
Listen look and listen and learn - A smart woman
Life is short, make it shorter. - A guy who died yesterday
You need to buy Coco Martin to see this feature.
Don\'t forget to eat your lunch!
If you ever feel useless, remember my way.
Momo, can i be your dog?
You like to get riced huh.
If nobody loves you, i guess you\'re ugly.
Why are you always looking at your homescreen?
Hey! Hey! Please make me aesthetic!
My jungler gets killed by a frog sometimes 💀
